name: Dwarven Digway
description:
NOTE: Webgl seems to do some funky things with a controller so if you play in the web just use a keyboard

You are a Dwarf and its your job to connect Ironvein and Hammerhall via tunnel! Try as you must you wont make it your first go around but no worries you can upgrade yourself and your loadout to be able to go even farther!
